Title: Relates to the effectiveness of chapter 89 of the laws of 2021 amending the public health law and the social services law relating to personal and compassionate caregiving visitors for residents of nursing homes
Summary: Relates to personal and compassionate caregiving visitors for residents of nursing homes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend section 3 of chapter 89 of the laws of 2021 amending the public health law and the social services law relating to personal and compassionate caregiving visitors for residents of nursing homes, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
